title: 美国Alabama不再向公众公布医院数据，开始学习中共传统艺能了吗?
contents:
Alabama卫生部表示医院职工状况及住院人数将不再对公众公布，如何看待?

Thursday, however, the Mobile County Health Department said that information was on a “need to know” basis and is only being shared with certain people and individuals.

新闻链接:https://www.wkrg.com/health/coronavirus/mchd-numbers-of-people-hospitalized-in-alabama-wont-be-shared-with-the-public/
